channel.description: Recent content in enclave on Lectern

item.title: JITGuard: JIT Compiler hardened with Intel SGX
item.description: Introduction This post presents the article by Frassetto et al. entitled “JITGuard Hardening Just-in-time Compilers with SGX”. The authors present both an attack against JIT compilers (injecting malicious JIT intermediate representation) and a defense solution. We will focus on the defense part and look at the JITGuard design in details along with its security and performance analysis. JITGuard Design JITGuard presents a number of measures to isolate the JIT components from each other and attackers.
